name: Basic Design System
description: Neutral shadcn-inspired design with left sidebar navigation, data tables, cards, and a restrained monochrome palette. Professional and information-dense.
keyPatterns: Fixed 256px left sidebar with collapsible sections
Top header with breadcrumb trail and user menu
Card-based content areas with subtle borders
Data tables with sortable column headers
Stat summary cards with delta indicators
Inline PRD editor with toolbar actions
avoidPatterns: Dark backgrounds on main content area
promptHint: Generate a design system following clean enterprise SaaS conventions in the style of shadcn/ui. Use a neutral monochrome base palette (background: #fafafa, primary: #171717, border: #e5e5e5) with Inter or Geist as the typeface. Apply a fixed 256px left sidebar for navigation with subtle border separation. Use 6px border-radius on all components. Cards have a white background with a 1px #e5e5e5 border â€” no drop shadows. Color appears only on interactive states and semantic indicators (green for success, red for destructive). Typography is compact: 13px body, 12px labels, 20px page titles. Keep information density high. The PRD editor, data tables, stat cards, phase progress bar, and section status table are the primary UI patterns for this application.
